summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for J Epstein & Co Inc. It includes various shipping transactions, charges, and recipient information, highlighting the shipping activities of the company during December 2000.

keyFacts: The document is an invoice from FedEx dated December 18, 2000, for shipping services provided to J Epstein & Co Inc.
The total charges for the shipping services amount to $138.41.
Multiple individuals are listed as senders in various shipping transactions associated with J Epstein & Co Inc.
The invoice includes details of shipping transactions that occurred between December 6 and December 12, 2000.
There are several shipping addresses mentioned, including locations in New York, Ohio, California, and others.
